artist: Designer: Warren Platner; Mill: American Art; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Both Patterns are on one piece of fabric. Top 42" are Canterbury. Canterbury Stripe has been machine stitched to top. This length of fabric shows two designs: "Canterbury" 99.1.116.2 and "Canterbury Stripe" 99.1.118.2 Lavender and Gold

title: Canterbury (and Canterbury Stripe)
